page.topic: Automatically refresh schema of tables when component is opened for editing
page.description: If checked, when the component is opened for editing, the Data Binding schema is automatically refreshed for each table.

section.description: When a UX component is opened for editing, if the component has been data bound to SQL table, the schema that is stored in the UX component for each table is automatically refreshed. To turn off this behavior, uncheck the *[ui:Automatically refresh schema of tables when component is opened for editing]* property.
